verses.verse: וַיְבִיאֵ֖נִי <WH935> Afterward he brought אֶל־ <WH413> to הַהֵיכָ֑ל <WH1964> me to the temple וַיָּ֣מָד <WH4058> and measured אֶת־ <WH853> הָאֵילִ֗ים <WH352> the posts שֵׁשׁ־ <WH8337> six אַמּ֨וֹת <WH520> cubits רֹ֧חַב־ <WH7341> broad מִפּ֛וֹ <WH6311> on the one side וְשֵׁשׁ־ <WH8337> and six אַמּֽוֹת־ <WH520> cubits רֹ֥חַב <WH7341> broad מִפּ֖וֹ <WH6311> on the other side רֹ֥חַב <WH7341> [which was] the breadth הָאֹֽהֶל׃ <WH168> of the tabernacle

וְרֹ֣חַב <WH7341> And the breadth הַפֶּתַח֮ <WH6607> of the door עֶ֣שֶׂר <WH6235> [was] ten אַמּוֹת֒ <WH520> cubits וְכִתְפ֣וֹת <WH3802> and the sides הַפֶּ֔תַח <WH6607> of the door חָמֵ֤שׁ <WH2568> [were] five אַמּוֹת֙ <WH520> cubits מִפּ֔וֹ <WH6311> each וְחָמֵ֥שׁ <WH2568> on the one side and five אַמּ֖וֹת <WH520> cubits מִפּ֑וֹ <WH6311> side וַיָּ֤מָד <WH4058> on the other side and he measured אָרְכּוֹ֙ <WH753> the length אַרְבָּעִ֣ים <WH705> thereof forty אַמָּ֔ה <WH520> cubits וְרֹ֖חַב <WH7341> and the breadth עֶשְׂרִ֥ים <WH6242> twenty אַמָּֽה׃ <WH520> cubits

וּבָ֣א <WH935> Then went לִפְנִ֔ימָה <WH6441> he inward וַיָּ֥מָד <WH4058> and measured אֵֽיל־ <WH352> the post הַפֶּ֖תַח <WH6607> of the door שְׁתַּ֣יִם <WH8147> two אַמּ֑וֹת <WH520> cubits וְהַפֶּ֙תַח֙ <WH6607> and the door שֵׁ֣שׁ <WH8337> six אַמּ֔וֹת <WH520> cubits וְרֹ֥חַב <WH7341> and the breadth הַפֶּ֖תַח <WH6607> of the door שֶׁ֥בַע <WH7651> seven אַמּֽוֹת׃ <WH520> cubits

וַיָּ֨מָד <WH4058> So he measured אֶת־ <WH853> אָרְכּ֜וֹ <WH753> the length עֶשְׂרִ֣ים <WH6242> thereof twenty אַמָּ֗ה <WH520> cubits וְרֹ֛חַב <WH7341> and the breadth עֶשְׂרִ֥ים <WH6242> twenty אַמָּ֖ה <WH520> cubits אֶל־ <WH413> about פְּנֵ֣י <WH6440> before הַֽהֵיכָ֑ל <WH1964> the temple וַיֹּ֣אמֶר <WH559> and he said אֵלַ֔י <WH413> to me זֶ֖ה <WH2088> This קֹ֥דֶשׁ <WH6944> unto me This [is] the most הַקֳּדָשִֽׁים׃ <WH6944> holy

וַיָּ֥מָד <WH4058> After he measured קִֽיר־ <WH7023> the wall הַבַּ֖יִת <WH1004> of the house שֵׁ֣שׁ <WH8337> six אַמּ֑וֹת <WH520> cubits וְרֹ֣חַב <WH7341> and the breadth הַצֵּלָע֩ <WH6763> of [every] side chamber אַרְבַּ֨ע <WH702> four אַמּ֜וֹת <WH520> cubits סָבִ֧יב ׀ <WH5439> round about סָבִ֛יב <WH5439> on every side לַבַּ֖יִת <WH1004> the house סָבִֽיב׃ <WH5439> about

וְהַצְּלָעוֹת֩ <WH6763> And the side צֵלָ֨ע <WH6763> chambers אֶל־ <WH413> above צֵלָ֜ע <WH6763> one over another שָׁל֧וֹשׁ <WH7969> [were] three וּשְׁלֹשִׁ֣ים <WH7970> and thirty פְּעָמִ֗ים <WH6471> in order וּ֠בָאוֹת <WH935> and they entered בַּקִּ֨יר <WH7023> into the wall אֲשֶׁר־ <WH834> which לַבַּ֧יִת <WH1004> which [was] of the house לַצְּלָע֛וֹת <WH6763> for the side chambers סָבִ֥יב ׀ <WH5439> round about סָבִ֖יב <WH5439> around לִהְי֣וֹת <WH1961> become אֲחוּזִ֑ים <WH270> that they might have hold וְלֹֽא־ <WH3808> not יִהְי֥וּ <WH1961> become אֲחוּזִ֖ים <WH270> but they had not hold בְּקִ֥יר <WH7023> in the wall הַבָּֽיִת׃ <WH1004> of the house

וְֽרָחֲבָ֡ה <WH7337> And [there was] an enlarging וְֽנָסְבָה֩ <WH5437> and a winding about לְמַ֨עְלָה <WH4605> still upward לְמַ֜עְלָה <WH4605> went still upward לַצְּלָע֗וֹת <WH6763> to the side chambers כִּ֣י <WH3588> Because מֽוּסַב־ <WH4141> for the winding about הַ֠בַּיִת <WH1004> of the house לְמַ֨עְלָה <WH4605> [was still] upward לְמַ֜עְלָה <WH4605> stages סָבִ֤יב ׀ <WH5439> round about סָבִיב֙ <WH5439> sides לַבַּ֔יִת <WH1004> the house עַל־ <WH5921> and כֵּ֥ן <WH3651> and thus רֹֽחַב־ <WH7341> therefore the breadth לַבַּ֖יִת <WH1004> of the house לְמָ֑עְלָה <WH4605> higher וְכֵ֧ן <WH3651> and thus הַתַּחְתּוֹנָ֛ה <WH8481> [from] the lowest יַעֲלֶ֥ה <WH5927> and so increased עַל־ <WH5921> to הָעֶלְיוֹנָ֖ה <WH5945> [chamber] to the highest לַתִּיכוֹנָֽה׃ <WH8484> by the midst

וְרָאִ֧יתִי <WH7200> I saw לַבַּ֛יִת <WH1004> of the house גֹּ֖בַהּ <WH1363> also the height סָבִ֣יב ׀ <WH5439> round about סָבִ֑יב <WH5439> around [מְיֻסְּדֹות כ] (מוּסְדֹ֤ות <WH3245> appoint ק) הַצְּלָעוֹת֙ <WH6763> of the side chambers מְל֣וֹ <WH4393> [were] a full הַקָּנֶ֔ה <WH7070> reed שֵׁ֥שׁ <WH8337> of six אַמּ֖וֹת <WH520> cubits אַצִּֽילָה׃ <WH679> great

רֹ֣חַב <WH7341> The thickness הַקִּ֧יר <WH7023> of the wall אֲ‍ֽשֶׁר־ <WH834> after לַצֵּלָ֛ע <WH6763> which [was] for the side chamber אֶל־ <WH413> of הַח֖וּץ <WH2351> without חָמֵ֣שׁ <WH2568> [was] five אַמּ֑וֹת <WH520> cubits וַאֲשֶׁ֣ר <WH834> which was מֻנָּ֔ח <WH3240> and [that] which [was] left בֵּ֥ית <WH1004> [was] the place צְלָע֖וֹת <WH6763> of the side chambers אֲשֶׁ֥ר <WH834> to לַבָּֽיִת׃ <WH1004> that [were] within

וּבֵ֨ין <WH996> among הַלְּשָׁכ֜וֹת <WH3957> And between the chambers רֹ֣חַב <WH7341> [was] the wideness עֶשְׂרִ֥ים <WH6242> of twenty אַמָּ֛ה <WH520> cubits סָבִ֥יב <WH5439> round about לַבַּ֖יִת <WH1004> the house סָבִ֥יב ׀ <WH5439> on every side סָבִֽיב׃ <WH5439> every

וּפֶ֤תַח <WH6607> And the doors הַצֵּלָע֙ <WH6763> of the side chambers לַמֻּנָּ֔ח <WH3240> [were] toward [the place that was] left פֶּ֤תַח <WH6607> door אֶחָד֙ <WH259> one דֶּ֣רֶךְ <WH1870> toward הַצָּפ֔וֹן <WH6828> the north וּפֶ֥תַח <WH6607> door אֶחָ֖ד <WH259> and another לַדָּר֑וֹם <WH1864> toward the south וְרֹ֙חַב֙ <WH7341> and the breadth מְק֣וֹם <WH4725> of the place הַמֻּנָּ֔ח <WH3240> that was left חָמֵ֥שׁ <WH2568> [was] five אַמּ֖וֹת <WH520> cubits סָבִ֥יב ׀ <WH5439> round about סָבִֽיב׃ <WH5439> around

וְהַבִּנְיָ֡ן <WH1146> Now the building אֲשֶׁר֩ <WH834> after אֶל־ <WH413> about פְּנֵ֨י <WH6440> that [was] before הַגִּזְרָ֜ה <WH1508> the separate place פְּאַ֣ת <WH6285> at the end דֶּֽרֶךְ־ <WH1870> toward הַיָּ֗ם <WH3220> the west רֹ֚חַב <WH7341> broad שִׁבְעִ֣ים <WH7657> [was] seventy אַמָּ֔ה <WH520> cubits וְקִ֧יר <WH7023> and the wall הַבִּנְיָ֛ן <WH1146> of the building חָֽמֵשׁ־ <WH2568> [was] five אַמּ֥וֹת <WH520> cubits רֹ֖חַב <WH7341> thick סָבִ֣יב ׀ <WH5439> round about סָבִ֑יב <WH5439> around וְאָרְכּ֖וֹ <WH753> and the length תִּשְׁעִ֥ים <WH8673> thereof ninety אַמָּֽה׃ <WH520> cubits

וּמָדַ֣ד <WH4058> So he measured אֶת־ <WH853> הַבַּ֔יִת <WH1004> the house אֹ֖רֶךְ <WH753> long מֵאָ֣ה <WH3967> an hundred אַמָּ֑ה <WH520> cubits וְהַגִּזְרָ֤ה <WH1508> and the separate place וְהַבִּנְיָה֙ <WH1140> and the building וְקִ֣ירוֹתֶ֔יהָ <WH7023> with the walls אֹ֖רֶךְ <WH753> long מֵאָ֥ה <WH3967> thereof an hundred אַמָּֽה׃ <WH520> cubits

וְרֹחַב֩ <WH7341> Also the breadth פְּנֵ֨י <WH6440> of the face הַבַּ֧יִת <WH1004> of the house וְהַגִּזְרָ֛ה <WH1508> and of the separate place לַקָּדִ֖ים <WH6921> toward the east מֵאָ֥ה <WH3967> an hundred אַמָּֽה׃ <WH520> cubits

וּמָדַ֣ד <WH4058> And he measured אֹֽרֶךְ־ <WH753> the length הַ֠בִּנְיָן <WH1146> of the building אֶל־ <WH413> along פְּנֵ֨י <WH6440> over against הַגִּזְרָ֜ה <WH1508> the separate place אֲשֶׁ֨ר <WH834> after עַל־ <WH5921> behind אַחֲרֶ֧יהָ <WH310> which [was] behind [וְאַתּוּקֵיהָא כ] (וְאַתִּיקֶ֛יהָא <WH862> gallery ק) מִפּ֥וֹ <WH6311> each וּמִפּ֖וֹ <WH6311> side מֵאָ֣ה <WH3967> thereof on the one side and on the other side an hundred אַמָּ֑ה <WH520> cubits וְהַֽהֵיכָל֙ <WH1964> temple הַפְּנִימִ֔י <WH6442> with the inner וְאֻֽלַמֵּ֖י <WH197> and the porches הֶחָצֵֽר׃ <WH2691> of the court

הַסִּפִּ֡ים <WH5592> The door posts וְהַחַלּוֹנִ֣ים <WH2474> windows הָ֠אֲטֻמוֹת <WH331> and the narrow וְהָאַתִּיקִ֤ים ׀ <WH862> and the galleries סָבִיב֙ <WH5439> round about לִשְׁלָשְׁתָּ֔ם <WH7969> on their three stories נֶ֧גֶד <WH5048> over against הַסַּ֛ף <WH5592> the door שְׂחִ֥יף <WH7824> cieled עֵ֖ץ <WH6086> with wood סָבִ֣יב ׀ <WH5439> round about סָבִ֑יב <WH5439> all וְהָאָ֙רֶץ֙ <WH776> and from the ground עַד־ <WH5704> against הַֽחַלֹּנ֔וֹת <WH2474> up to the windows וְהַֽחַלֹּנ֖וֹת <WH2474> and the windows מְכֻסּֽוֹת׃ <WH3680> [were] covered

עַל־ <WH5921> over מֵעַ֣ל <WH5921> over הַפֶּ֡תַח <WH6607> To that above the door וְעַד־ <WH5704> against הַבַּיִת֩ <WH1004> house הַפְּנִימִ֨י <WH6442> even unto the inner וְלַח֜וּץ <WH2351> and without וְאֶל־ <WH413> and on כָּל־ <WH3605> all הַקִּ֨יר <WH7023> and by all the wall סָבִ֧יב ׀ <WH5439> round about סָבִ֛יב <WH5439> around בַּפְּנִימִ֥י <WH6442> within וּבַחִיצ֖וֹן <WH2435> and without מִדּֽוֹת׃ <WH4060> by measure

וְעָשׂ֥וּי <WH6213> And [it was] made כְּרוּבִ֖ים <WH3742> with cherubims וְתִֽמֹרִ֑ים <WH8561> and palm trees וְתִֽמֹרָה֙ <WH8561> so that a palm tree בֵּין־ <WH996> was between כְּר֣וּב <WH3742> [was] between a cherub לִכְר֔וּב <WH3742> and a cherub וּשְׁנַ֥יִם <WH8147> had two פָּנִ֖ים <WH6440> faces לַכְּרֽוּב׃ <WH3742> and [every] cherub

וּפְנֵ֨י <WH6440> So that the face אָדָ֤ם <WH120> of a man אֶל־ <WH413> toward הַתִּֽמֹרָה֙ <WH8561> [was] toward the palm tree מִפּ֔וֹ <WH6311> side וּפְנֵֽי־ <WH6440> on the one side and the face כְפִ֥יר <WH3715> of a young lion אֶל־ <WH413> toward הַתִּֽמֹרָ֖ה <WH8561> toward the palm tree מִפּ֑וֹ <WH6311> side עָשׂ֥וּי <WH6213> on the other side [it was] made אֶל־ <WH413> toward כָּל־ <WH3605> all הַבַּ֖יִת <WH1004> through all the house סָבִ֥יב ׀ <WH5439> round about סָבִֽיב׃ <WH5439> around

מֵהָאָ֙רֶץ֙ <WH776> From the ground עַד־ <WH5704> against מֵעַ֣ל <WH5921> and הַפֶּ֔תַח <WH6607> unto above the door הַכְּרוּבִ֥ים <WH3742> [were] cherubims וְהַתִּֽמֹרִ֖ים <WH8561> and palm trees עֲשׂוּיִ֑ם <WH6213> made וְקִ֖יר <WH7023> and [on] the wall הַׅהֵׅיׅכָֽׅלׅ׃ <WH1964> of the temple

הַֽהֵיכָ֖ל <WH1964> of the temple מְזוּזַ֣ת <WH4201> The posts רְבֻעָ֑ה <WH7251> [were] squared וּפְנֵ֣י <WH6440> [and] the face הַקֹּ֔דֶשׁ <WH6944> of the sanctuary הַמַּרְאֶ֖ה <WH4758> the appearance כַּמַּרְאֶֽה׃ <WH4758> [of the one] as the appearance

הַמִּזְבֵּ֡חַ <WH4196> The altar עֵ֣ץ <WH6086> of wood שָׁלוֹשׁ֩ <WH7969> [was] three אַמּ֨וֹת <WH520> cubits גָּבֹ֜הַּ <WH1364> high וְאָרְכּ֣וֹ <WH753> and the length שְׁתַּֽיִם־ <WH8147> thereof two אַמּ֗וֹת <WH520> cubits וּמִקְצֹֽעוֹתָיו֙ <WH4740> and the corners ל֔וֹ וְאָרְכּ֥וֹ <WH753> thereof and the length וְקִֽירֹתָ֖יו <WH7023> thereof and the walls עֵ֑ץ <WH6086> thereof [were] of wood וַיְדַבֵּ֣ר <WH1696> and he said אֵלַ֔י <WH413> to me זֶ֚ה <WH2088> This הַשֻּׁלְחָ֔ן <WH7979> unto me This [is] the table אֲשֶׁ֖ר <WH834> is לִפְנֵ֥י <WH6440> that [is] before יְהוָֽה׃ <WH3069> God
וּשְׁתַּ֧יִם <WH8147> had two דְּלָת֛וֹת <WH1817> doors לַֽהֵיכָ֖ל <WH1964> And the temple וְלַקֹּֽדֶשׁ׃ <WH6944> and the sanctuary

וּשְׁתַּ֥יִם <WH8147> had two דְּלָת֖וֹת <WH1817> And the doors לַדְּלָת֑וֹת <WH1817> leaves שְׁ֚תַּיִם <WH8147> [apiece] two מוּסַבּ֣וֹת <WH4142> turning דְּלָת֔וֹת <WH1817> leaves שְׁ֚תַּיִם <WH8147> two לְדֶ֣לֶת <WH1817> door אֶחָ֔ת <WH259> [leaves] for the one וּשְׁתֵּ֥י <WH8147> and two דְלָת֖וֹת <WH1817> leaves לָאַחֶֽרֶת׃ <WH312> for the other

וַעֲשׂוּיָ֨ה <WH6213> And [there were] made אֲלֵיהֶ֜ן <WH413> about אֶל־ <WH413> on דַּלְת֤וֹת <WH1817> on them on the doors הַֽהֵיכָל֙ <WH1964> of the temple כְּרוּבִ֣ים <WH3742> cherubims וְתִֽמֹרִ֔ים <WH8561> and palm trees כַּאֲשֶׁ֥ר <WH834> after עֲשׂוּיִ֖ם <WH6213> like as [were] made לַקִּיר֑וֹת <WH7023> upon the walls וְעָ֥ב <WH5646> and [there were] thick עֵ֛ץ <WH6086> planks אֶל־ <WH413> on פְּנֵ֥י <WH6440> upon the face הָאוּלָ֖ם <WH197> of the porch מֵהַחֽוּץ׃ <WH2351> without

וְחַלּוֹנִ֨ים <WH2474> windows אֲטֻמ֤וֹת <WH331> And [there were] narrow וְתִֽמֹרִים֙ <WH8561> and palm trees מִפּ֣וֹ <WH6311> side וּמִפּ֔וֹ <WH6311> the other אֶל־ <WH413> on כִּתְפ֖וֹת <WH3802> on the one side and on the other side on the sides הָֽאוּלָ֑ם <WH197> of the porch וְצַלְע֥וֹת <WH6763> and [upon] the side chambers הַבַּ֖יִת <WH1004> of the house וְהָעֻבִּֽים׃ <WH5646> and thick planks
